title: Bloomberg Markets: Zlomek on Ecommerce, Music App Deals
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Zlomek on Ecommerce, Music App Deals
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Erin Zlomek Editor Bloomberg VC Wrap Discussing this week's venture capital deals news, including funding for online gaming company Sea Limited and Smule, maker of social media music apps.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
